text: The candidate must have 5+ years of experience developing high-performance applications using **Node.js** and proficiency with modern **CI/CD pipelines**.
Required to build complex financial models and conduct variance analysis. Expert-level knowledge of **VLOOKUP and Pivot Tables in Excel** is essential.

extractions.extraction_text: VLOOKUP and Pivot Tables in Excel

text: The designer will create wireframes and high-fidelity mockups for new features. Must be proficient in **Figma** and follow **Atomic Design principles**.
Oversee installation and troubleshooting of industrial machinery, demonstrating certification in **PLC programming (Siemens S7)** and schematic interpretation.

extractions.extraction_text: installation and troubleshooting of industrial machinery

text: Responsible for managing large-scale datasets. Experience with distributed processing frameworks like **Apache Spark** and writing complex queries in **PostgreSQL** is mandatory.
